snippet: The company said it planned to close more restaurants in the United States than it opens this year. That hasn’t happened since at least 1970.
lead_paragraph: The company said it planned to close more restaurants in the United States than it opens this year. That hasn’t happened since at least 1970.

headline.main: McDonald’s to Cut U.S. Stores for First Time in Decades
headline.print_headline: Mcdonald’s To Cut U.S. Stores For First Time In Decades
